effects.display_string: (4) Set: Heal, Flash Heal, and Prayer of Healing have a 50% chance to cast again at 35% effectiveness.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 818,154 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 455,252.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
